title: [Neuroscience] Physically active lessons in school can enhance pupils' learning. Physically active lessons improved cognitive function tests by about 30% on average, when compared to the other group, and that motor development tasks improved by about 25%

[Medicine] The effect of fecal microbiota transplantation on stroke outcomes: A systematic review (Sep 2022) "FMT can be a possible therapeutic approach for treatment of stroke and recovery of post-stroke complications"
